Overall, thrilled with the results and LOVE THIS COMPANY! I will definitely call them again for my next project.

A few months ago, my husband and I had Treeium remodel our Master Bathroom. Our Project Manager was Neev Kugel and he was absolutely phenomenal to work with. We couldn't be happier. So recently we decided to do a total remodel on our stairs too, so of course we called Neev at Treeium. Once again, he was excellent to work with. Our stairs were done beautifully and as always the customer service and quality of work were all at the highest level. Just like our Master Bathroom remodel, our Project Manager Neev Kugel was always on top of the project from start to finish. We have received so many compliments on our new stairs. Thank you Treeium, and even more specifically, thank you Neev!

We are very pleased with our new bathroom! Liran Avital was the project manager and he listened well to our description of what we wanted in the remodel. Each step of the project was carefully planned and carried out, and the finished room meets all our goals and expectations!
Virginia Connell

My name is James Peery. I hired Treeium for a bathroom remodel. I went on Home Advisors and was given the name of three contractors. The only one who called me was Treeium. 

I was contacted by project manager Don. He showed up on time, was very interested in my needs, and gave me a quote. I found Don to be knowledgeable, polite, and most of all he was not "pushy" about me signing with Treeium. Don also made it a point to come by the project weekly to check progress.

I also dealt with Devon who works in client complaints and quality control. I found Devon to be a breath of fresh air who took care of all the issues I wanted addressed. Devon even called me on her day off to keep me up to date on the resolution of my issues. I wasn't having quality issues as much as I was frustrated with the length of the project and some other minor issues. Devon treated all my issues as if they were major and she was always pleasant. 

I also dealt with the field quality control manager. His name is Dror. He was awesome. He listened to my concerns, took pictures, and made sure all the work was done to his standards and mine. Dror was great to work with.

Overall my remodel turned out great. The price didn't change and the work looks awesome. I would recommend Treeium for anyone needing construction work done.
Very helpful and always great communication. The project managers were really wonderful and did their best to try and make sure things were as we wanted.

Erez Shifferman, Sam and their Crew at Treeium showed up on time from day one. They are a very professional bunch. They took stress off my shoulders when it came to doing mold remediation in my Master Bathroom. Even though the job was small, they took it VERY seriously because the problem was serious. I really thank them all. His crew members were clean, fast, and they very reliable. I recommend them 100%. Erez was very helpful in explaining the work process. Every time I called or texted, he answered right away. They did an amazing job. Sam took it upon himself to make sure that the mold remediation when smooth and clean. Great job guys!!!

We completed our project on 03-15-2016. Erez Shifferman project manager and his crew did an amazing job on remodeling our master bathroom. They converted a walking shower to a roll in shower and lowered one sink to make these wheelchair accessible. Erez Shifferman was very professional. He keep us informed and he help make this a good experience. we would recommend Treeium to others and have them request Erez Shifferman. It was a pleasure working with him..

I just wanted to commend Treeium for an outstanding job. My husband and I have worked with a couple of different contractors and this is the best experience we have had by far. Our Project Manager, Neev, was so helpful. He was with us every step of the way. We never had to wait long for responses to our questions and he was always solution oriented. If we had a question, he had an answer. If we wanted something addressed, he made it happen. We truly felt like he had our best interest in mind. We never felt pressured, it was about what was best for us and our project. The execution and craftsmanship of our kitchen is beyond our expectations. We would highly recommend Treeium and Neev to anyone! He made the stressful experience of a kitchen renovation pretty pain free.

great general contractor for big jobs, thorough bids submitted promptly. highly recommended. 

their project managers take full ownership of the bidding and supervising process. you can tell the employees have high morale and care deeply about their craftsmanship. 

for our project, they came through with a bid on the bathroom which was fair, but the kitchen was not reasonable. overall, they were 5k over the next lowest bid. Still, id consider hiring Treeium on future projects.. they were very honest and not afraid to put things into writing.

We had a complete kitchen remodel done (changed layout, cabinets, flooring, lighting, etc), along with extra floor replacement in the hallway and family room. After interviewing 3 contractors, Treeium's project manager, Liran Avital, was the only one who really listened to what we wanted as opposed to what is typically done. He proposed options and considerations, and yes we had to make trade offs, but we are so happy with our new kitchen. They were very professional about presenting a visual design and juggling things around so we could make better design choices. The interior designer Michelle was helpful about promoting design strategies and guiding us in our decision making.  Norm, the foreman, was very on top of the progress and keeping us posted; he was always willing to address any of our concerns. The work crews / individuals were friendly, hard working, and clean at the end of every day. Treeium was very accommodating about incorporating things which were slightly out of original scope for no extra cost.  They approached complications with a positive attitude and changed things to satisfy our requirements.    They completed the entire project ahead of schedule . We would hire Treeium again for future remodeling projects.

I just wanted to say, I LOVE the work this company has done!!!! Idan Navon was a helpful Production Manager walked me though the complete process. The workers on the house did a AMAZINGLY BEAUTIFUL job on the work done!!! They were ALWAYS on time & trusted my judgement on the tile, wood floors & marble counter tops! The workers even helped me pack up the house since I had school & work going on & couldn't do it myself. Treeium is even helping me finish the payments so I can finish paying for the job done. Yes, you will pay a little more for the work, SO WORTH IT FOR THE WAY YOU ARE TREATED!!!! They treat you like family. I would recommend then to ANYBODY who needs renovations!

We did a complete gut and remodel to our master bath.  We met with Kobi and Amir and hired them to do the job. We received the quality promised at the price promised. No hidden costs during or after. The finished product is just what we wanted, and looks beautiful. I would recommend Treeium for and remodel project you have.

I had such a great experience working with this company. I hired them to install a pretty complicated banister (since the handyman I haired before had already done a lot of damage that needed fixed). The project manager, Guy, was truly fantastic! He walked me through the whole process, was always super responsive and made me feel super comfortable with everything. The contractor came by upon request after hours to answer some questions, and he noticed I was moving in and offered to help out with our move.  The crew worked long hours and late to get the job done before the deadline I needed and it looks incredible and feels super sturdy. I'm so glad I found them and plan to use them to remodel my bathroom next!

We were referred to Treeium from an online website.  During our initial phone call with them, they were very polite, friendly, and professional.  We told them were were looking to do a home addition.  We had no plans and no permit.  They said they were a full service company, which means, they can do the plans for us, get the permits, and build our project.  Sounds great.  They sent out an email and text to confirm the appointment time.

When their estimator arrived, it turned into a nightmare.  We showed him a rough sketched of what we were looking to do.  He didn't both looking at our sketched and told us since we had no plans, meaning blue prints and construction documents, he can't help us.  When I said we were very clear when we made the appointment, we do not have plans yet and Treeium would have us come up with one should we decide to move forward.  He was not happy with the fact we didn't have a plan, then he just threw out a number between $80k to $1`50k without even looking at what we wanted to do.

When I said, had I known they needed plans before they gave estimates, I would not have had them come out because it was wasting our and his time.  His reply, "Yes, you are wasting my time."  Those were his exact words.  After he said that, I sent him on his way.  He was only at our house for five minutes.  

I called Treeium back and informed them what happened.  The lady who answer the phone pulled up our request and she said it clearly stated we had no plans, no permits, and looking for an estimate.  She apologized and offered to send someone else out.  I was so upset at this point, I told her there is no need.

I took the day off from work, the appointment was at 10am on a Wednesday, to meet with them.  I clearly wasted a day of work for a fruitless meeting.  Poor service from their estimator, very rude and extremely unprofessional.

My experience with Treeium and my project manager Ron Admony has been fabulous. I was lucky enough to have stubbled upon Ron and Treeium as they were finishing a remodel in my neighborhood and was so impressed with their work I went over to talk with Ron. He immediately came over to my house and gave me his recommendations for my remodel projects. Not only was I so pleased with his ideas, but also that he took time to come over himself as he said he would that I hired Treeium. They  have continued to offer amazing customer service and quality work.   I have used Treeium for my solar installation, remodeling of  bathrooms, replacing kitchen counters, interior painting, acoustic ceiling removal and electrical work throughout my entire house. Their staff shows up as scheduled, on time and will not leave until the work is completed to your satisfaction.  They all aim to please and will work with you to make sure the end result is what you want.  My project manager, Ron Admony,  is amazing and has become a true friend, always available for any questions or concerns and makes sure that the Treeium staff knows exactly what I am expecting.  I highly recommend Treeium and Ron Admony as your project manager for all your remodel needs, they will make any home project painless.

This is a review if Sam Deen and his crew.  I'm in the middle of a bathroom remodel. I originally contacted Treeium for an estimate to replace a shower in my second bath. From the very start I was very impressed with Sam Deen the project manager. Not only did he arrive on time, he was amicable, yet professional. I need several repairs to my home, so after we walked through the bathroom I asked Sam to provide me with an estimate for the other projects. Not only did he provide me with an itemized estimate that covered everything, he also provided me with individual itemized estimates. Sam and I discussed my budget and agreed to start with remodeling the first bathroom. Never, have I experienced a contractor who listens and understands.  Sam made my best interest his first priority and not how much profit he could make. Sam is reliable, trustworthy and compassionate.  He understands the concerns, financial constraints and yes the anxiety inherent to remodeling. Sam  guided me through design, selecting the tile, fixtures, vanity, etc. He is 100+% dedicated to his customers satisfaction. I have become accustomed too and look forward to Sam's morning call and his. arriving in the morning along with which ever craftsman that is needed for the day.  On the rare occasions he is not present, Sam is on the telephone and/or sending a text message. If, I have any questions or need clarification he's a phone call away. I believe his leadership and presence has helped to the project on schedule. His crew is equally amazing.  They are focused and respectful of your home.  The work area is kept orderly and all traces of materials or debris is completely removed by the end of the day.  Words cannot express how satisfied I am so far.  I am confident  the finished project will be exactly what I expect.  If you're looking for a general contractor I highly recommend you call Treeium and  ask for Sam Deen . You want be disappointed.  I'll update this review when the project has been completed.

I have decided to hire Treeium to do my Kitchen Remodel and I couldn't be happier! About a month ago I met who would later become our project manager, Mr. Neev Kugel, and our experience of working with him has been nothing short of great! His professionalism, experience, and attention to details is what made us decide to move forward with him to begin with, but boy, were we in luck! Neev kept us up-to-dated at all times throughout our project. He made sure all of his workers came on time and completed their job in a timely and professional manner. He went over and beyond to make sure we were happy at any stage of our project, and even included a few extra line items that were not even included in our original agreement. I was hesitant about who I was going to hire to do our project but I am so happy we eventually decided to pick Treeium and I'm delighted to have had the chance to work with our project manager, Neev.

Thank you Treeium for giving us the Kitchen of our dreams and thank you Neev for everything!

Our new kitchen is almost finished and we've been very impressed with the work of Kobi Farkash and his Treeium team since Day 1! They're organized, clean, communicative and keep to their planned schedule. The quality of the cabinets is excellent. The granite finishing work is fantastic. The onsite work quality has been very good and the workers seem to be proud of their work and like what they're doing. Kobi over-communicates - he texts every evening or morning to remind us what's happening the next day. If we've brought up something to him, his onsite worker knows almost immediately. Kobi has an answer for everything. He is a great problem-solver too - when something didn't quite look right, he came up with several solutions to choose from. We would highly recommend Kobi as your Project Leader!

My bath remodel experience with Treeium was positive.  The crews at all stages of the remodel showed up on time each morning.  There were minor issues that came up but project manager Guy Barnea addressed the issues quickly.  I liked how I was able to order the vanity and tile with the contractor discount.  I received everything I asked for and the result is a bathroom I enjoy!

My name is Pamela Van Horn and I've met Ron Poliker after I've signed a contract with another company. Ron have heard that I signed the contract yet came back after 5 hours to make sure I was not been taken advantage of. He came at 8 pm and reviewed the contract with me and pointed out that there are errors, over sites and over pricing. I contacted the other company and canceled the checks and Ron made sure they will not harass me any more. He gave me a much better price and much broader service. the crew was fast and professional, Ron came in every day and listened to my needs. He had a manage fly in from the head quarters in LA to look after the project. Ron is my guardian Angel!!! 
Thank you very much Ron Poliker!!!!!
Treeium is amazing!!!

We planned to have our kitchen remodel in late of 2014 with limited budget and had three estimated quotes.  We almost made up our decision with the 2nd contractor and went to his showroom to see and choose the cabinet's door with color & the counter top (our decision already decided before we have the meeting with Ron Admony from Treeium).   Ron Admony "Project Manager" from Treeium was the last one that contacted us for the third quotation and had an appointment which we thought we only gave two hours for his presentation as a social manner; but we ended up to pick Ron from Treeium EVEN with highest price of the three quotations.  We are very happy that we picked Ron as our Project Manager, he was consistent to provide his support and helping us to finish the project ahead of the deadline.  As the rule of thumb, everything was not smooth and easy as we were looking for during our remodeling kitchen, there were few obstacles that impacted the progress and may delay the schedule; but Ron Admony was always available either by phone or by coming to contact us regarding of any issues that we encountered when the project started until finished.  He responded to our questions or concerns any time that we had in couple hours or personally came to help us to resolve the issues.  He also provided his inputs to help our decision on color, counter top, and/or anything that will help our remodeling kitchen looks prettier.  His goal is always to make sure his customer satisfaction and happy.  It's really a learning lesson to remodel the kitchen and we're glad that we picked Treeium with Ron Admony as our project manager to work on our project.  The final reward was our beautiful kitchen and our family really enjoyed.  Thanks Ron Admony for great job well done and we're sure to contact you for our next project.  Treeium could be the contractor if you need to pick for any home improvement projects and special Ron Admony will be your Project Manger.

Even if you know what you are doing, any kind of home improvement is potentially very scary.  There are so many things that can go wrong, or unexpected problems that can arise.  So, it has been my experience, to hire a contractor that is a professional & knows what he is doing.  
I am very comfortable & confident in recommending Guy Barnea & Treeium for your home improvement project.
I don't write a lot of reviews, and most are when something goes wrong !!
But in this case, I recognize how important to find a qualified person/company to do contracting work....and want to share with everyone my very positive experience.
His prices are very competitive....(not the cheapest)....but the cheapest price normally gets you the cheapest work....which usually makes it ultimately not the cheapest. And why would you not want the best quality work possible.
Guy's attention to detail, only made me extremely comfortable & confident about my expectations. Everyone from his laborers to supervisors accomplished everything I had asked for and Guy's output only made the "hurdles" minimal and made me a very satisfied customer.  
I think the best thing I can say....is if (and when) I have another remodeling project....I now need to make one phone call......which makes this process even better.
Great Work Guy & Treeium............I couldn't be happier !!

I had my master bathroom done and they did a great job. They are professional and on time with the schedule. They even worked extra hours 
to complete the project. I highly recommended this company

Great job Treeium! Good customer service Guy Borenstein & Sal. Quality workmanship. Your guys were willing to go the extra mile to make our experience less stressful. They clean up at the end of the day, put furniture back if they had to move them... The project was done 1 week later than scheduled otherwise you would have gotten 5 stars.

We decided to remodel our outdated kitchen and found Treeium on a home improvement website.  After making an appointment Guy Breuer,the project manager,came to discuss our needs and gave us an estimate.  The project entailed a full gut of the kitchen which went very smoothly with a minimal amount of dirt and dust.  Rene, the foreman, and his crew did a very good job of being on time and finishing the project in a reasonable 3.1/2 weeks.  All through the renovation Guy was available to help with the choosing of finishes and design choices.  Though any renovation is stressful the crew from Treeium made the experience a little less so.  We would definitely recommend Treeium.
I am in the middle of the project.  Guy Borenstein has been my contact and very helpful and cooperative in the planning process.

The project is completed and we are very happy with the results.   We had Treeium add a walk-in shower in one bathroom and make the second into an on-suite master bath.  In addition, they created a laundry closet and opened up the kitchen to allow for a large refrigerator with custom cabinets. They installed a beautiful glass bowl vanity and custom linen closet in the master bathroom with glass tiles in the shower and along the back of the vanity.  With Ron at the helm and a very able crew, including Luis, Arturo, Juan and Alex, they were able to get the project to a stage where we could move in on time and then they completed the last stages of the project without delay.  We have received many compliments on how the project turned out and everyone who sees it agrees that Treeium did a great job. We highly recommend Ron Admony and Treeium to do your next project.  Not only will they handle your project with professionalism, they understand how important this is to you and treat you and your property with respect.

Treeium is the best company in la and probably in California !                            I am so happy to work with this company , they always looking to make there coustemer happy , they ask all there workes to be professional ,, be on time , ask for the  best quality , all job permits  and to do always the extra miles for you,,,     I  chose to work with treeium because  I want pice of mine ,! We hired Treeium to remodel our home which included a completely gutted kitchen, all new electrical rewire, removal of acoustic ceilings, new Travis stone fireplace, refinished hardwood floors,  paint of all walls and a tankless water heater. Guy came ready to make our family feel like we don't need any further consultations! 
He was:
Friendly- Called ahead to let us know he was on his way.
Great communicator- IMPORTANT! Listens to every idea and executes it.
Enthusiastic-Really excited to get the job.
Professional-Came with his Badge around his neck w/ ID and License.
Artistic- Visualized something we would have never considered.

So I had researched many different companies to get an estimate on the remodeling process at my mothers home. Going through of course Houzz, HGTV, magazines, remodeling guides, internet, and local ads, Guy made us look no further. 

My family got larger within the year with the birth of our 1 year old son and paying $1,650 for a leased home without utilities, car payments, insurances and daily expenses. We decided to make some changes. To minimize our costs. We plan to remodel the home to make it two private family areas.
My Mother owns a home in a prime location in Atwater Village and it currently has 7 bedrooms, 4 restrooms, 2 kitchens, 1 laundry area, 2 large living rooms and dining rooms and a large front yard and back yard. Not to mention also the garage.  

I had numerous consultations about building UP and making it it a two story home. 
Until, Guy! Once he looked at the place he was so inspired that he actually got me excited after being disappointed with high quotes and bad communication of what we are trying to achieve.
He said the house has a large enough in square footage and that we do NOT need to build up. Mind you; building up you are looking at more time, Money and hard to get permits. (Almost a $2-300,000.00 job which I still have all the past contractors calling and harassing me.) He said that the house is large enough to accommodate two different families with their own private area, entrance etc.. 
He said that it was just not designed right,; It looks like a maze. All we really had to do is rearrange all aspects of the house with a good floor plan, knock down walls, and since pluming is underground  with crawl space that would be the fastest, easiest, and inexpensive solution. HE MADE MY DAY!

Out of so many consultations NOBODY gave me that option. I knew then he wasn't there to just get a job and take my money. 
Anyways he came through a few days later with his virtual 3D designer and she measured the whole house and told me that she will design a likable, livable layout and email it to me with the draft including my furniture. All I had to do is send her photos of my current furniture to incorporate them in the visual display. How awesome. I can edit and change everything to our liking. I am just so excited on the actual construction which I can not review about since we are not there yet. 
So far, So good, But I will definitely update my thoughts throughout the process.

My review is way overdue, it was around this time last year  that I hired Kobi who is one of the greatest project managers I've ever dealt with. Their office is just beautiful; the staff is just amazing and super friendly. It was very nice to actually put a face behind the voice. I would personally like to thank Elizabeth for helping me finance my project at great rates which I can afforded. 

My first project was a kitchen remodel that Kobi, he met all of my expectations and more. He made my dream kitchen a reality.  The cleanup crew was fantastic. I never had to worry about picking up after the contractors when they were finished for the day. 

I have recommended Treeium and Kobi to my friend which hired them as well and is super happy with her project as well. I'm looking forward to installing my solar panels on my house.

I was looking for a company to do my master and main bathroom renovations, but wanted to start out with a smaller project first - stairwell, ceiling refinishing, and painting - to see how well the company managed the project.  I was initially interested in Treeium because I liked the idea that their company was doing their part to be a little more green.  

From the very first meeting with my project manager through to the end of the project, I felt I had all the information about what they could do with my project and how they would go about meeting my ideas.

When we ran into an unexpected structural problem that required additional work before we could move on, my project manager was able to quickly adjust the contract and all the work was still entirely completed on schedule.

Having used a number of different contractors for other big projects in my home, I appreciated most that they took care of the 'little things' to make the whole project look complete.  They removed some fixtures to work through the whole space instead of taking the short cut of just working around the fixtures. They caulked the gaps left from previous work so that it would blend in perfectly with their work.  And, they did some extra finishing on a couple of the walls so that the painting would look even more precise.

I was very pleased with the work Treeium did and the ease of working with them, and am planning my bathroom renovations with them now.

We selected Horizon Construction & remodeling in Fullerton because of their high rated reviews and we felt very comfortable with David Eskin the project manager. we thought he will be a good match since we will need to communicate with him on daily basis for the entire length of our remodel. we wanted to achieve clean and simple look, more space on our counters along with timeless design.

This my experience with Horizon Construction and Remodeling,
and why I recommend them.
This is the second time that I have hired a contractor. The first time was a bathroom remodel, and it was a disaster, so I was very apprehensive about hiring another contractor.  We needed to remodel our kitchen, so I had no choice. I did my due diligence and research and called three companies to interview. All three I had no prior knowledge of or experience with. Out of the three bids, there was a high, a medium, and a low.
After talking to them one more time I went with the medium bid company. That company is called Horizon Construction and Remodeling. It turns out I made the right choice. My experience with this company is the complete opposite from my first experience with a contractor. 
My Project Manager was Mark, who did an outstanding job of keeping the project moving quickly efficiently. His crews showed up on time, were professional and did quality work, from plumbing to electrical to framing to painting to cabinets all were done to my satisfaction. If something was not done to my satisfaction (which was rare), I just let Mark know about it and he would send someone to either redo or touch-up the work. Mark would visit the job site frequently.
I feel Mark is honest and has his customer’s best interest at heart. There were a couple of times when he could have charged me extra money for items that came up during the project, but he did not. 
Like any project we had to make some changes along the way, and Mark is very willing to work with you to make sure that you get what you want. Mark will listen to your ideas plus he has many ideas himself. He helped us a lot with our kitchen design.
They started my project Oct. 11, 2001. My wife and I were hoping to have the project done by Christmas. They had it done in 7 weeks in time for Thanksgiving!
The inside staff is led be Enna. They make sure everything is ordered on time. They even arrange for inspections. They are very polite and efficient and responsive.
We are doing our doors and windows next and we going to have Horizon Construction and Design do the work.
I recommend Horizon Construction and Design; I give them a strong 10.

Mark and Diane Kincheloe   
Fountain Valley, CA.

Horizon Construction & Remodeling, did everything they promised. Their man did quality work. They said “it will be done” and it was done as they said.
Our Kitchen & bathroom remodel turned better than we thought.

We would recommend them to anyone.

Such a pleasure to work with Mark and the entire staff at Horizon Construction. Not only did they remodel our entire house filled with furniture during a pandemic, but we did the whole process from out of town. We are so grateful for the hard work, service, and patience that went into making our house look beautifully updated!

So happy to have gone with Horizon Construction for our major kitchen, and 2 bath, remodel project.! From the first meeting with Mark, the owner, I felt that he was trustworthy, knowledgeable and fair. He, and the Horizon Construction crews, did not disappoint. Communication with Mark, Enna, and the office staff were admirable. Mark's design expertise was very helpful. He met all of our wants & needs. Our kitchen was taken from a poorly designed eyesore to a beautiful space. We had major structural work, removal of load bearing beams and steel moment frame, installing three steel beams at the ceiling to create an open floor plan. We completely changed the footprint of the kitchen. Custom cabinets turned out beautifully! The materials purchased through Horizon Design were of high quality and sourced in a timely manner. Workers were friendly, arrived on time and cleaned up at the end of each day. We were so pleased with the kitchen that we added on two bath remodels which were completed along with the kitchen. Thank you Horizon for delivering a quality space which we are happy to invite our friends & family to. We will enjoy the beautiful kitchen & bathrooms for many years to come!

Horizon construction & Remodeling remodeled/updated both my master and the main bathrooms, which were in their original mid-60s construction state.  David Eskin and his team of tradesmen helped bring my vision to fruition.  As with any project, once the walls were opened up, some revisions were required; based upon their expertise and experience, Horizon was able to provide a few suggestions and a few “tweaks” to address these revisions.  I couldn’t be happier with the results! Both bathrooms are much more functional and beautiful!
Horizon also did some minor improvements in my laundry area – again improving the functionality and looks!
Note: Remodeling costs did not cover much of the material costs.  I had already selected and/or purchased some of the building materials; I did research and purchase much of the remaining materials (tub, vanities, tiles). Horizon does have its own showroom, and could have provided these at an additional cost.  However, because I already had a firm idea as to what I wanted, I handled the ordering of these myself.

Our kitchen was remodeled by Mark Besnos and Enna at Horizon Construction and Remodeling. We chose them after seeing all the great reviews on the Houzz app. When we walked into their showroom, we were warmly greeted by Diana who made us feel very comfortable.  Their product display made it easy for us to put our ideas together. Mark’s crew did a wonderful job.  Kudos to his crew, they really worked hard. Joel Chavez was a standout carpenter/jack of all trades doing much of the major work and tying together any imperfections and any loose ends that arose with a great attitude, expertise, and skill. He’s quite an asset to Horizon.  Antonio Garcia who did our fabulous backsplash and Tom Tzur was the electrician.  Mark ensured that each phase of the project was done correctly and completed on time (about 8 weeks). We gutted and replaced our 80’s kitchen (10’ by 10’) including the small dining area. We kept the same layout but switched the positions of the sink, stove and refrigerator.  Enna helped with all the communication and paperwork and scheduling of the inspections, payments etc.  Thanks to Mark, Enna, and their crew, we have a beautiful modern kitchen with two toned white and blue cabinets.  
Lessons Learned:
1.Stick to your budget and have extra funds for unforeseen things because for sure there will always be something that will come up.  Understand what is and is not included in your contract.  Don’t just assume that everything is included.
2.Be flexible with your time. There is a general outline of what jobs will be done in order mostly during the weekdays but things may change with short notice.  
3.Check that your materials/colors are in stock before you sign your contract. Due to the Covid and political environment, some materials may take longer to get or not at all.  Some newer colors may cost more.
4.Look at your cabinet colors in every light.  We first looked at an espresso-colored cabinet that looked like black in shade and looked light cherry colored under the full sun. 
5.Know what crown molding you want for the top of your cabinets…having pictures will help.
6.Ask Mark if you are not sure of any detail or work that has to be done. Do not wing it…else any fixes may cost you extra. 
7.For lighting such as chandeliers, measure everything. Use you tube to learn to measure your lighting fixtures.
8.Certain changes such as electrical, structural will require city permits and inspections.  Your city’s inspector’s availability will cause delays up to one week. 
9.Choose your grout color for the backsplash…apparently there’s a ton of them (we were looking at different shades of grey because white is too hard to clean). 
10.Choose your door and doorknobs ahead of time. Check to make sure it works including deadbolt after it’s been installed.
11.Choose your baseboard style and size.
12.Choose your light dimmers switches.

After shopping several companies, we chose Horizon Construction and Remodeling for our home improvement project, which was to enlarge and update our kitchen and main bathroom.  In addition, we converted all of our flooring to vinyl.
We are extremely happy with the service, responsiveness, dependability, and the results Horizon provided.  David Eskin was our project manager.  David became a consultant and friend during the process.  He proved to be patient and honest when we encountered an issue with the granite installation for our kitchen.  We upgraded our material to a beautiful and unique Brazilian granite for our kitchen counter.  Our initial granite slab cracked 3 feet across the width of the counter 2 days after installation.  David and his crew reviewed the issue and, without hesitation or argument, removed the cracked granite and replaced it with a new slab at their cost.  Although this experience was extremely stressful for all, the integrity displayed by David and Horizon was stellar and unique in the construction industry.  Contractors are easy to find, but an honest and dependable one is rare in our opinion.  On this experience alone, we would recommend Horizon Construction and Remodeling without reservation.  They made it right.
All construction is stressful and we lived in our house during the remodel.  This project was our first in this home, but our fourth major reconstruction in our 45 years of marriage.  Horizon was by far the best remodel experience!

We were referred to Horizon Construction and Remodeling from my sister's coworker at Houzz for a full kitchen remodel. Our consultation went wonderfully and we felt very comfortable with David. He did a great job explaining their company and the process for our kitchen remodel. He was able to take all of our ideas for the kitchen and make them a reality. He was honest and helpful throughout the whole process and we did not have to stress about all the things you hear other people having to go through during a remodel. He was quick to respond to any emails, calls or texts. The only thing I wish we would have received without asking for was a weekly schedule on what was happening each day and who we would be expecting at the house and what time so we could plan ahead as full time working parents. Overall we were very happy with every contractor who worked on the kitchen! We do not have one complaint about any of the people that came into our house throughout the remodel. We would highly recommend Horizon to our families and friends for any future remodeling and would us them again in the future. We feel that we now have our dream kitchen thanks to the team at Horizon Construction and Remodeling.

We had a fairly large, relatively unused laundry room and a guest bedroom without an attached guest bathroom.  After hunting for a contractor I met Michael who was really friendly, had a clear cut understanding of what I was looking to do without much back and forth, and gave me a break down quote for each aspect of the project in a fast and timely fashion. We converted our downstairs bedroom into a mini master suite with an attached bathroom, French doors where a window once was, and sound proofing of the walls to prevent noise from our flat screen in the family room that shares a wall. We then made a smaller laundry nook. Albeit a few scheduling communication errors, everything was done with care and what I really liked was how Michael would come and look at things and notice stuff that I didn't even see and get them fixed and or corrected on his routine walk throughs. Additionally, the workers that would come to the house never made me feel uncomfortable or worried.

We recently remodeled our Master bathroom and chose Horizon Construction & Remodeling in Fullerton to do the job.  Overall, we had a great experience! We were given a fair price for our remodel and the quality of work was excellent.  Everyone we worked with was polite, courteous and professional.  Any minor issues that came up were addressed promptly and correctly.  Our bathroom looks a million times better is a lot more functional.  Bravo to David, our General Contractor, and his crew!  We would definitely recommend Horizon Construction & Remodeling to anyone and we plan to use them again for our next remodeling project.

Lori Lisanti

When you realize you need work done by a contractor, a lot of apprehension may go through your mind.  But those fears and doubts will be washed away if you choose to work with Horizon Construction & Remodeling in Fullerton, CA 92832.   We dealt mostly with David and from our first meeting we had a good feeling about working with him and Horizon.   David really listened to our ideas and gave us a few of his own which we never would have thought about.   While we wanted to do a few small projects as well (painting all rooms in our house with new flooring, lighting and baseboards), our “big” decision was to remodel our kitchen.    This was a complete gut down to the bare bones of the room then build it back up.  Throughout the entire process David made frequent visits to check on progress, answer questions, and if something needed to be looked into, he was on it right away.  His team always came as scheduled, and we were always looped in every step of the way.   David’s timeline for completion was right on target as well.   It helps that we too were always ready with whatever we needed to provide such as ordering and delivery of our new kitchen appliances, picking lighting fixtures and paint colors and coming to the show room to pick out our flooring, cabinetry, countertops and back splash.  And by the way, their showroom has a large array of options to choose from.  We even had a few last-minute thoughts of having the facing of our fireplace redone and adding some extra lighting in the home to which David accommodated easily.  Even with a few snags due to Covid 19 whereas the countertop and backsplash we picked (which had been on order for months) was suddenly unavailable, his team was on it and helped us pick back up options, to which we found we loved more than our original choices.   In the office, we also worked at times with Maria and Enna, both of whom were pleasant, knowledgeable and helpful to us.    David’s team was courteous and respectful and followed safety protocols like wearing masks.   Since we worked from home, it was easy to practice distancing since we were all in different rooms.  And if the workers needed to speak to us, everyone wore masks and stood apart out of courtesy.    We were overwhelmed with how beautiful the kitchen turned out and were just as pleased with how refreshed and updated our whole interior looks now.   We would highly recommend working with the team at Horizon because this experience helped us rest those apprehensions I spoke of in the beginning.   And we achieved what we wanted in that now when you walk in our kitchen, you just say “WOW.”  Thank you.

We had our completely remodeled, removed a load-bearing wall to open up the kitchen to the den. We also did a full remodel on our small master bathroom to create a big master bath with a small walk-in closet which we did not have before. Also our laundry room was moved to the hallway along with some change orders along the way. We are very happy with the end result and we are enjoying our new home.

Excellent results! What was once a dirty, moldy, ugly bathroom now looks like a spa bathroom in a Vegas hotel; I’m still amazed at the transformation even now that it’s been operational for a while. 

David was very responsive to texts, and always followed up to be sure things were going well, and even when I wanted a big, heavy mirrored medicine cabinet against his recommendation, he graciously had the backsplash tiles adjusted so the back wall could be rewired, then hung the mirror and now it looks great. At least I think it does.

I wanted a particular finish on the cabinets, but he advised to go much darker, which was counter(get it?)intuitive to me, but he was absolutely right, and the dark cabinets contrast perfectly with the earth-tones and creams throughout the rest of the bathroom; I’m glad for his recommendation as it maintains the warm design while providing an elegant touch. 

I can be a difficult client, but David was gracious throughout, and his subcontractors all did a great job and were very pleasant. I also appreciate that while it wasn’t the biggest project, just a smallish bathroom, he gave it his all and treated it like a project of any size; I was actually rejected by a couple of contractors because the project wasn’t ‘big enough’ but David and Horizon gave it their all. I can’t be happier with the end result - the transformation is nothing short of remarkable.

David Eskin with Horizon Construction and Remodeling did a great job coordinating the remodel. All the trades did an excellent job. Any issues were responded to and fixed immediately. We are very happy with the finished product, and will use them again in the future.

We are happy to see the remodeling is completed.  I am satisfied with the materials chosen and the suggestions made throughout the process.  Alicia and Mark Besnos collaborated in choosing the design materials.  We look forward to many years of our new bathrooms.   
Thank you Horizon Construction & Remodeling for the remodels.

Brian and Alicia Dolan

The upstairs bath had been partially remodeled prior to purchasing my condo 5 years ago. It had an updated vanity and lavatory, but the tub and shower combination were the original fiberglass builder-grade enclosure and definitely showed its age of 30 plus years. I wanted this bathroom to look as good as the rest of my home with a new tub, new tile, and new flooring.
Horizon Construction and Remodeling Inc. expertly gave me exactly the bath I desired. Horizon’s showroom had ample samples of tiles and I was easily able to select the bath/shower wall tile and flooring that unified my vision. I did not have to wait long for the job to commence and all work was done as quickly as I could have hoped. The only delays were due to unavoidable waiting for inspections and a holiday that delayed one inspection. For those tasks that did not require an inspection to proceed, the trade contractor would show up the following morning. I was able to have my walls retextured and painted, a new overhead light added above the bath/shower, replace the medicine cabinet, and a new exhaust fan and all fixtures installed for the completed beautifully finished bathroom.
My project manager David Eskin coordinated each trade and supplies wonderfully. All of the contractors selected for my project were very professional and I appreciate how quickly and well each performed their trade work. I am delighted with workmanship and the end results.

We had a kitchen and powder room remodel Aug- Oct 2020. We love the final product! It is pretty much exactly what We envisioned. The project finished in a timely manner, and his guys did a phenomenal job; especially tile (Fernando) and cabinets (sorry I don’t remember everyone’s name). Mark was knowledgeable and answered our questions promptly. He was good at showing up frequently and reviewing all the work. 

My only suggestion for improvement would be giving a more accurate estimate, and notifying the owners of the cost of any changes prior to the work being done. The project ended up quite a bit more than anticipated. However, we are happy with the result, and would recommend Horizon to others.

We had our kitchen entirely re-done by Horizon Construction & Remodeling. Horizon replaced our cabinets, sink, inserted a backsplash, rewired our receptacles to meet current code and repainted the walls. They also installed recessed lighting under the cabinets which really brings out the ambiance of the kitchen overall. It was a complex operation and they project-managed it flawlessly. They took a lot of time to truly understand what we wanted and then provided examples and expertise to help guide us to our final decisions. We could not recommend them more for anyone looking to remodel their kitchen.

On behalf of my husband and myself, we highly recommend Horizon Construction for your home projects. This recommendation letter is long overdue. We hired Horizon Construction Inc. in the summer of 2019 to gut and remodel a master bedroom bath and install a sliding glass door. Michael the construction manager was very transparent with us about the timeline and the steps and costs. Everything was done exactly as he said.

To begin with the contract manager Michael was an utmost professional. We told him what we wanted and he gave us a reasonable estimate that closely matched our own estimated costs. As recommended before committing to hiring a contractor we requested 2 other estimates, one came in ridiculously higher than Horizon and one quite a bit lower than Horizon, but we went with Horizon because of Michael’s evident knowledge and on spot recommendations. The meeting with the other contractors didn’t leave my husband or I with the same confidence in amount of knowledge of process and esthetic know how. In the long run Michael’s trained eye for function and aesthetic helped us come up with a design that we are extremely happy with.

Their entire crew was extremely knowledgeable and efficient. We were extremely pleased with their attention to detail and craftsmanship.

We did our master bath remodeling this year and we chose Horizon construction for the second time. Mark the owner, as usual, came up with the perfect design for our relatively small space. The design let us include a big shower, closed bathroom area and lots of closets. Something I did not think we could accomplished at first.
The construction went fast considering the City closure for Covid19. They did a fantastic job and kept everything clean during the construction.
We now have a very beautiful Master Bath we enjoy every day. I recommend Horizon Construction for any remodeling you need. They are very good at what they do

Professional work done by professional workers in a professional way. We highly recommend Horizon for any home improvement or repair that you might do. Last year Horizon repaired the stucco, wood trim and painted our house. The paint started to peel on part of the trim and they promptly repaired it at no charge. We are also happy with the patio cover they did for us last year.   Steve an Toni G

Our wrought iron fence was on its last leg, already rotted through.  We wanted a short block wall topped by a vinyl fence. I found Horizon Construction on a couple of the “help” websites and called them. Eitan Beznos came out, discussed the job and provided an estimate. We came to an agreement and they started the next week. The block wall went fast, they finished the 2’ H x 60’ L wall in one day. It is on top of a steep 60’ tall hill.  The job was completed in a timely manner.  All along, Eitan kept me aware of progress and status.  He came out to inspect the job. At the end, Eitan and the company owner/manager came out and inspected the job to make sure we were satisfied.  We could not have been anymore satisfied with the work, the timeliness, and the cleanup efforts. Horizon finished the job on the originally forecast completion date.  I would recommend Horizon and Eitan Beznos for any construction or re-modeling efforts you might have.
Richard McRae

We got bids from 5 different contractors for the construction we needed in our backyard. We were converting our garage into an additional dwelling unit (ADU), which has very specific requirements in most cities. David Eskin came out from Horizon; they were the last bid we received. All the bids came in just about the same ballpark, but we chose Horizon because David seemed very upfront and personable at our first meeting. He took the time to address our questions and concerns; all of them, even if we didn’t particularly want to hear the answers. We trusted him. We live in a historical home, so there were many rules we needed to follow and styles we needed to match exactly. David, his crew and Horizon did that perfectly. We ran into some problems because our house is old. They couldn’t have been foreseen because nobody knew what was under our garage. Those problems were frustrating and added expense to our project, but David and Enna at the office helped us through those as well. The interior turned out so much better than we imagined it would! It’s just beautiful. We would recommend Horizon to anyone needing to get any work done in or around their home. Awesome company!!

Eitan Beznos of Horizon Construction did a major Remodeling on my kitchen, bathrooms, bedrooms and garage. This included:
New patio slab.
Removal of wall and load bearing 4x4's.
Kitchen island.
Fireplace.
New roof.
New ceiling.
Complete rewire of house and garage. 
Power panel upgrade and electric car charger in garage.
Paint interior and exterior.

Eitan was the project manager. He was easy to work with and there was good communication with Eitan and the office staff. The process was clearly written down and all questions were answered.

I did not know exactly what I wanted and Eitan made useful suggestions. He designed the layouts and helped me select materials for the floor, ceiling, kitchen counters and bathrooms.

Eitan pulled permits and all of the inspections were passed.
There were often several teams of workers in the house at the same time. Eitan coordinated the work to insure that the progress was efficient and that different groups did not get into each others way.

When problems came up Eitan dealt with them. Termite damage was discovered and had to be addressed before a bathroom could be completed.
Building codes required that work had to stop when old flooring was removed by a hazmat company.

While I thought that the quotes were high, what I got were clear goals, quality of work, management of workers, problem resolving and the overall progress of the project.

I was very satisfied with the end result. The open floor plan between kitchen and family room and the removal of cupboards in the hallway, makes the house look very expansive. The transformation was stunning.

I would recommend Eitan for home remodeling.

Bob Davis

we recently had our master bath shower remodeled by Horizon Construction. we wanted a universal design to accommodate his and her showers with a bench , rain shower, 2 hand held showers, and grab bars. it is a very professional job and finished on time. david and the entire crew were fantastic to work with. we are pleased with the functionality and look. we had interviewed several different contractors but Horizon was the only one that saw our vision and made it happen. i highly recommend Horizon Construction for any remodel project. susan joyce

I had the bathtub removed from the master bath and a shower with a steam unit installed. David Eskin was the project manager and was a pleasure to work with. Despite the current pandemic situation, David kept the project going. The workers were amazing, each one an expert in their respective craft. The job was finished beautifully and I’m very happy with the results. I would highly recommend Horizon Construction for any remodeling job.

If you're shopping contractors, and want to avoid a nightmare, read this. Licensed contractors are not all the same. Horizon Construction & Remodeling gets 5 stars. This company delivered what was promised. I'm not affiliated with Horizon in any capacity. I'm a customer, who hired them to remodel my bathroom after calling 5 other contractors, who either didn't show up, or quoted ridiculous bids. Mark, who owns the company with his wife, Enna, gave me a quote that was right about middle range. He paid attention to my vision, and when I asked  his opinion, he had great ideas, but was never forceful. He was also right up front about everything—nothing hidden. After I decided to sign the contract, I was still somewhat skeptical. Bathrooms and kitchens are multi-phase projects, and things can go south quickly. I'd already heard all the nightmares about hiring the wrong contractor. By day 2, I noticed that Mark, also my project manager, stayed on top of every detail, so I stopped stressing. All the crews he sent for each phase were skilled, knowledgable, and cleaned up afterwards. I got the impression this company only uses competent crews, who produce quality workmanship. No problems communicating, either. Mark was always available. Another thing: he's organized, and kept the project moving forward. The staff appeared to be organized, as well. I'm thrilled with the appearance and function of my new bathroom—it's gorgeous. It turned out much better than I had expected.  If I have another remodel project in the future, I won't hesitate to hire them again. Thank you so much, Mark, Enna, Grace, Anna, Maria and staff!

We had a great experience with David Eskin on the remodel of our kitchen and floors in 2019. Work was completed on time and his workers were outstanding.  Four months after completion there was a problem with the grout cracking along the kitchen counter and David promptly sent his tile guy out to re-do the cracking grout.  Now, four months later, the problem occurred again. David promptly responded again and this time they used a flexible material that matched the grout perfectly.  In my experience Horizon Construction stands by their work and has responded quickly to my concerns even after the project was completed.

I hired Mark Besnos and Enna of Horizon Construction and Remodeling in the spring of 2019 to do a complete kitchen remodel which included removing a load bearing wall and removing a gas fireplace.  The actual construction began with the demolition in mid-July and the job was completed the last week of October. I had a great experience overall despite the usual stresses of a home remodeling project (and living in the house during construction). Mark listened to my ideas and concerns and he helped me bring the beach cottage home of my dreams to fruition. He was very knowledgeable and gave me great advice on every aspect of the project. Mark and Enna invited me to their showroom in Fullerton and showed me a wide variety of materials (flooring, tile, Quartz, cabinetry, etc.) to choose from.  I appreciated Mark’s attention to detail, thorough explanation of our contract, extensive resources, and consistent open communication. Mark was the project manager for my remodel and he was onsite regularly to oversee his crew. I always felt as though my project was Mark and Enna’s top priority. Any time I had a question or concern, Mark and/or Enna, promptly took my call or immediately called me back. Mark was committed to keeping the project on schedule as much as possible, even when unforeseen delays occurred due to materials being held up. He always had a plan B to keep things moving. All of his crew members were very reliable, courteous, and dedicated. Many of his crew members even came to my house on weekends. I am extremely happy with my new, improved, expansive kitchen, living, and dining room. I absolutely love it! A huge Thank You to Mark, Enna, the incredible office staff (Genesis and Vanessa) and to all of the skilled craftsmen at Horizon for creating a beautiful home for my family!

Horizon construction and Remodeling did a major kitchen remodel for us including removal of walls, fireplace, and reconstruct a large portion of our ceiling.  They literally transformed our kitchen!  
After checking out many others, we decided to choose Horizon Construction and Remodeling because of all the great reviews.  After meeting the staff, our project manager David Eskin and reading all the positive reviews we knew we made the right decision.  The staff is wonderful.  Very caring, respectful and honest.  Our kitchen turned out  beautiful.  We are very happy with the outcome!

Demolition was right on schedule and the crew was excellent, very fast and left the job neat at the end of the day. We did however encounter a set back which caused a long pause after demolition.  This lengthened the job quite a bit and added additional expense and inconvenience (we feel) could have been avoided with a more through inspection (pre-demo). 
All the staff at Horizon are great to work with.  David our project manager is terrific.  He is easy to work with and very helpful.  He provided suggestions that were very helpful and added to the beauty of our job.  There were times he could have lost his patience because of my indecisiveness but never once did!  He’s a true gentleman.
Caesar our cabinet maker is a master at his trade.  We love his work and are so pleased with our cabinets!
Something notable that you may not find in many other constructions companies.  With Horizon, once the project ends, they treat you with the same kindness as the day you signed the contract.  

This company shines in Customer satisfaction!

We recently had our 2500 square foot home remodeled by Horizon Construction & Remodel, which included the kitchen, master bath, flooring, lighting, paint, fireplaces, millwork, plumbing and tile.  We contacted a total of four general contractors, all of whom were within the same approximate price range, however, after meeting with Mike Roppo, we decided to sign a contract with Horizon and we’re glad we did!  Mike was our Project Manager and he did an excellent job overseeing and managing the entire project from start to finish.  He is professional, knowledgeable, personable and made sure that everything was done right!  He was quick to respond to phone calls, texts, and emails and came by to check the work often.  We are retired so we were able monitor the work as it was being completed.  At times issues would arise, but whenever we expressed a concern, Mike was prompt to resolve it, making sure that all work was done to our complete satisfaction and that no corners were cut.  All of the contractors that worked in our home were very experienced and good at what they did!  We were especially impressed with Hector who painted the entire inside of the house, and Victor who did all of the tile and marble work in the master bath, kitchen, and fireplaces.  Also Ulyses (plumbing), Hugo (flooring), Caesar (countertops), and Tomar (electrician), were all excellent at their crafts.   The process of remodeling our entire home took five months and everything turned our beautiful!  Horizon Construction & Remodel is an excellent company that stands behind their work and prides themselves in customer satisfaction!

All workmanship and workers were very professional and very nice. 

They always cleaned after their jobs. We are very happy with the way our bathroom turned out. 

Michaelangelo Roppo - our project manager was very helpful. He spend 2 days shopping with me, picking out everything was needed for the remodel. And I DO MEAN EVERYTHING. 

i really did appreciate his time snd expertise. 

The ladies in the office are very nice. 

Enna Eskin helped me match colors and styles for cabinets and counter tops in Horizon's showroom. 

I will recommend Horizon Construction and Remodeling for any of your projects

Our goal was to remodel the kitchen, guest bathroom, and flooring of our home. This is the very first time my wife and I have ever took on a major remodel project. It was important to have a contractor that was honest , responsive, and did quality work within our budget. Since my wife and I work and are extremely busy with our kids, it was also important that we have project manager that would communicate with us and closely monitor the people working on our home regarding quality. We met with Eitan, project manager for Horizon Construction  and he took the time to understand that these qualities were important to us. He was also very honest about the project and did not overpromise just to earn our business. Eitan and his company made sure we knew they wanted to do what’s best for us and immediately we felt confident Horizon was fit for the job. His crews were very professional and would answer our questions and always cleaned up when they left for the day. Of course there were some hiccups during the project such as the fridge not fitting in the space and some kitchen cabinets needing to be moved around and adjusted. In the end, the things we requested got fixed and Eitan made sure we were happy. I would recommend Horizon to those that see the value of a project manager. Overall, the quality was good for our budget and I would rate Horizon a 4.7 out of 5.

I has Horizon Construction & Remodeling out to do a bid to remodel a guest and master bathroom because of their high rating on Angie’s list.  An appointment was made and David Eskin showed up right on time.  He gave me a detailed bid right on the spot in writing.  Horizon did each bathroom separately so I could always have a usable shower.  I had already picked out most finishes before I got bids.  However, after the backsplash I had picked out was installed, I hated it.  David was great and said they would re-do it no problem with whatever alternative tile I picked.  There were some issues throughout the process that came up but I really appreciated that David and his subcontractors always came up with a solution.  The final products are beautiful.  Now I have 2 spa-like bathrooms with modern finishes that I’m thrilled to show off.

We contracted Horizon Remodeling to remodel our fireplace and paint our kitchen, family room, living room and hallway.  Eitan Beznos managed the project and was extremely conscientious making sure all work was done correctly and completed as promised.  He met with us frequently to check progress and make sure work was done to our satisfaction.  When we asked for additional electrical work, he arranged for an excellent electrician named Tomer who did a fantastic job for us,
We would recommend Horizon Remodeling.  Work was well done and finished earlier than promised.

Horizon completed a 450 square foot addition on our house that included moving an exterior wall and reworking the roof line to add a bathroom and expand three bedrooms.  This project took place from July 2019 to November 2019.  Our primary criteria for selecting a construction company was familiarity with working with our city, timeliness, and quality of work  performed.

We are very happy with the final product of this project.  The finished work provided by Horizon Construction is beautiful and works well within our high end home. The craftsmen used for the detail work were top notch, and the projects that needed to match existing finishes in the house look nearly flawless in their integration.  We did not have any problems with permitting the plans or with passing the inspections with the city so there were no hold ups time wise because of inspection issues.

When any hiccups did occur, as they occur in any remodel or home project, Horizon was very quick to correct them to the best of their ability or propose solutions that would result in the same high end product we were looking for.  The customer service provided was quite good.

David is a great project manager and was very attentive. He made sure any and all concerns were addressed promptly and that questions were answered in a very timely manner.  He was great about working with me in regards to our timeline and making the process of living through the project as painless as possible.

In short, I am quite happy that we chose Horizon Construction for our addition project and would absolutely recommend them.

I decided to do a complete bathroom remodel, and after meeting with several contractors, I decided on Horizon Construction and Remodeling Inc.. I am very happy with my overall experience. My bathrooms look absolutely beautiful. Horizon gutted both bathrooms and replaced everything with new white porcelain tile, sparkling mosaic panels and backsplash, sturdy glass doors, chrome trims, and all new fixtures. They painted both bathrooms light grey with white trims, and replaced the laminate floors with light grey toned tile. I love the results and I am glad I decided to do business with Horizon.

I also had a great experience with Horizon’s customer service. They provide excellent service. Everyone I spoke with (demolition crew, plumber, office staff, contractor, owner) was professional, competent, and courteous. Initially, I was in constant contact with contractor, David Eskin. He was punctual, knowledgeable, and professional. In the second half of the project, I was in constant contact with Enna. She was professional, knowledgeable, and very attentive to my requests. Whenever I had a question or concern, I could text her and she would respond within minutes. That was important to me and I appreciated the expediency. Based on my customer experience with Enna, I can say she cares a lot about the reputation of the company and delivering great customer satisfaction. The project is now complete, and thanks to Horizon Construction and Remodeling Inc., I have two beautiful bathrooms.

My wife and I have added a master bathroom and walk in closet, as well as adding a new linen closet and floors throughout the house with Horizon Construction. We are so happy with the outcome and how our project manager answered any questions we had along the way. We feel confident that if any issues pop up in the future that we can call and they will send someone out to correct. We have referred Horizon to our friends and will recommend them in the future as we are so happy with the outcome of our house.

I contacted Houzz to search for a contractor to remodel our two small bathrooms.  I did not know where to start.  They put me in touch with Horizon and within a couple of days I was meeting with Eitan Beznos, their bathroom specialist. What impressed me most about Eitan was his friendliness and his desire to look after my every remodeling need. He was up front with the cost and the time it would take to complete both bathrooms. He recommended the best place to shop for tile and bathroom fixtures. He even took me shopping to look for vanities and helped me choose the size and design I was looking for.  Once the work was started the project crew became extended family, coming and going as needed. I was contacted almost daily by Eitan or Genesis Millan from the office to make sure I knew what was the plan for the day.  There were inspections at each stage of the project  and we still came in under the original time frame given.  I am so pleased with the  professionalism of the everyone who was a part of the remodel, the quality of the workmanship and the beauty of both bathrooms.

We are very pleased with the way our fireplace wall looks .
Each phase of the project was done by workers who were skilled and experienced. 
They did their job quickly and always made sure the room was kept clean.
The project was unique and changes the appearance of the whole room. 
We would recommend David Eskin our project manager and Horizon Construction & Remodeling Inc to anyone thinking of Remodeling any room in their house

My wife, Kathy and I back in late July contacted three contractors to provide us an estimate to remodel our bathroom’s toilet and shower area.  Eitan Beznos provided us, what we felt was the estimate and help.  For this remodel, we were under somewhat of a time constraint to try and complete the project by 9/3.  
Eitan’s crew started demolition as promised on the day as promised.  Eitan had Ron, and George come in for the rough framing, electrical and plumbing, which was completed within the first week along with the Hot Mopping.  Ron and George and the hot mop person did an incredible job completing on schedule or even ahead of schedule.
The main impact to the remodel, was from the city inspection crew.  While we were delayed a week before we could tile the shower and the floor, Eitan and Ron had their tiling crew work the Labor Day Weekend to try and catch up, which again we were held up for city inspection. Further delaying completion.  George came in to perform the finish work, even coming in late in the day, I am sure after putting in a full day on another job.  The custom shower doors that have been installed are beautiful. 
We have had numerous construction jobs performed over the years, (pool installation, patio install, room additions, etc) and Eitan was always available either by phone or coming by to check, and everyone who worked on the remodel was friendly, professional, always cleaned up and tried to help minimalize the impact of dust, smell and noise as much as possible.
I will definitely look to Horizon for any further work.

I met with David Eskin from Horizon Construction; he was very friendly and professional.  We discussed the projected and my expectations.  Within a few days, David had the estimate ready and we met for a second time.  When we met to review the proposal, David went through everything in detail.  

A few days later, I called David and told him that I would like Horizon to be the contractor for my project.  We then agreed on a starting date.  I told David I would be out of the country during the beginning phases of the project.  He assured me that wouldn’t be a problem and would keep me posted throughout the process.  

I really enjoyed going to their showroom to pick out the materials for the project, I felt like a kid in a candy store.  David was there through that process as well and offered suggestions if asked.  

Everything went smoothly for the most part throughout the process.  Some issues came up regarding the electrical panel, this was no fault of David’s, and he was quick to resolve the issues.  David was always quick to respond to my text messages or emails to address any questions or concerns I might have had.  

For the most part, the project came out better than anticipated.  Everyone who was involved with this project was always kind, courteous and eager to assist.  

Thank you, Horizon!!!

Shane P. Branham

We were very happy with the work done by Horizon
Construction on our remodeling project. We love our 1954
suburban home, but the two bathrooms were in serious need
of updating. Horizon started work and we immediately knew
we were in good hands. The workmanship on the floor and
shower tile was superb. In our master bath we had custom tiles
installed in the shampoo shelf that made our shower really
shine. The workers in charge of painting, vanity installation
and plumbing were very friendly and professional. We felt
very comfortable having them in our house. They answered
questions and communicated their progress to us. The overall
job was done in a timely manner and we were always informed
of any delays.
David the project manager kept us updated throughout the
entire process and helped us to realize our vision of a
southwestern style guest bathroom. He took care of all the
paperwork with our city's permit process. We were given
notice of any delays and he responded to texts immediately.
On one occasion, while we were shopping for vanities at a local
warehouse, he texted with us for over half an hour to make
sure we got the right one. Halfway through the project we
decided to re-pipe our entire house and David made that
happen. His plumbing crew had the re-pipe done in two days.
We feel confident recommending Horizon for your remodeling
needs. They respected our house and it showed in their work.
We can't wait to show off our new bathrooms to friends and
family!

We wanted to remodel for a long time.  Had interviewed several contractors. We didn’t know anyone here.  When we met David from Horizon we felt safe. He understood our vision and helped us clarify it. We liked that Horizon is 1 stop destination with a showroom, this is truly helpful in this process. We chose David Eskin with Horizon Construction and Remodeling, Inc. to and it turned beautiful. We Loved All horizon workers.  We had few communication glitches but those were resolved right away. David did a great job keeping his cool and listening to all our questions and concerns and was on top of it right away ready to explain and resolve. 
My only feedback will be in this area - to try and explain the clients more so less questions will arise. 
Overall we are very satified with our new kitchen and 2 new bathrooms and recommend Horizon construction and remodeling in Fullerton CA 
to others !

I contracted Horizon to do a remodel of a portion of the house that converted an old bedroom and master/bathroom, into a modern master with a large bedroom and guest bathroom. The initial budget was doubled what was targeted due to many unexpected expenses (some due to my request, others due to lack of foresight in planning).

The workmanship was of good quality generally but there were areas where attention to detail was not taken. 

The customer service has been the best part of working with Horizon. When problems arose with plumbing down the line, the company was responsive and helped fix the issue and even help with one that was due to the fixtures. They also did not charge for small minor requests (swapping faucet on an unrelated portion of the house).

Overall, I would say that the experience is positive.

Horizon Construction recently completed a fireplace remodel in my home.  This was our first attempt at any major work here.  They were very professional and did a great job.  There were times when they had to work around my schedule and times when workers remained until evening to finish a project.  
I appreciate the prompt responses I received from Mike and the office staff when I had questions. He made good suggestions and had explanations about the process.  As in another review, the cost was significant for a one-wall redo, but I’m very happy with the result.  
There’s a small adjustment needed in the recessed lighting, but I’m confident this will be finished soon.  Overall, I think they were professional and easy to work with.

While searching for a quartz counter top to coordinate with my existing beige flooring, I discovered Horizon.  They had what I wanted and secured a backsplash with a mosaic to complete the color scheme. Mark is a hands on contractor-owner .  He oversees every step of the job and there is little down time in the process.  The workers willingly try to accommodate customer requests.  If an installation is not satisfactory, it is corrected.  Horizon does an excellent job for the price charged. 

Arlene Hoskins

After poor experiences with previous contractors, we came into our next home repair project with reservations and a long check-list of characteristics we wanted in our next contractors, including responsiveness, professionalism, expertise, and follow-through.  Horizon was one of the half dozen businesses we solicited.

If cost was the only factor, Horizon would not have been selected.  While the company provided discounts, its estimate was triple the lowest bid and thousands more than another contractor we were considering.

We met Rey and Omri, and we were impressed with the way they addressed our concerns and exuded pride in the company’s reputation for high customer service and satisfaction.

We got what we paid for:
• Jobs were completed as scheduled (or there was sufficient communication and transparency during the few times complications arose).
• Horizon was responsive, both in its communication and follow-through with requests.
• Workmanship and attention to detail was excellent.
• The company handled minor incidental items without charging us extra.
• Half a year later, we contacted the business about a warranty issue.  • The company was prompt in its response, and the problem was fixed within a few days.
