Addtionally, the project came in on budget  and there were minimal bumps along the way. We couldn't be happier with the end result.

It is atypical to find a company and owner/operator with the morals, ethics, standards of excellence, creativity and personality that meets or exceeds their representation or quotation. "Customer service, fairness and peace of mind" are typically not associated with contractors, let alone most companies. In Bob's case, these are exactly his characteristcs, and those of his workers. As the father of a handicapped son, I required a bathroom remodeling that had to be sophisticated yet practical; I required a crew that was professionally responsible and time-sensitive to the project. Bob is a hands-on, honorable, forthright gentleman. He is not a yes man in the sense of agreeing to anything and everything just to get a job. His input provokes thought and positive results. Unlike other contractors who model after magicians and disappear after the contract is signed, Bob was at the work site each day - morning, afternoon and sometimes evenings. His crew works for him and are craftsmen who take pride in their work and showed up on time each day, including weekends. Bob's contract was professional, specific, detailed and he did not nicke and dime for specific changes that most other contractors would have done so, for they are not interested in building long term relationships and either don't care or understand the value of word of mouth, which can either be a businessman's best friend or worst enemy. Needless to say, the result of the bathroom exceeded my expectations, the contract price did not and Bob is a man of his word and worthy of a phone call when you consider a home improvement project. I know that I will not hesitate to call him again in the future.

I hired Bob to renovate, design, and rebuild my two bathrooms in my home. He did a great, high quality job. He worked with me every step of the way and made me feel very comfortable. Even with no planned budget he kept costs to a very reasonable level. Bob is a good fit if you are looking for high quality work and can accomodate anyones budget, high or low. His designers did a great job on everything.

Kraftmaster Renovations and Bob Gockeler gave me the kitchen I have been dreaming about for years.

 Despite my anal attention to detail and last-minute plan changes, he never made me feel I was out of order in my opinions or proposals. 

He was just as excited as I was every step of the way... and especially with the finished product. His crew was clean, reliable and trustworthy.

Our 50 year old kitchen needed to be gutted and we were looking for a contractor that did both the design work and construction. Once we met with Bob, we didn’t need to look further as his quiet enthusiasm and love for design and construction, customer service, and quality was evident throughout our discussion. Bob listened well to what we wanted, gave us several creative designs, was able to easily adjust as the work progressed and we requested changes. All throughout, he was upfront on costs and options, handled the unforeseen behind the wall structural and plumbing surprises, the two layers of ceilings, the 5 layers of floors, and guided us in making the many decisions on the design and materials. He never took shortcuts when faced with problems to fix, and took the extra time to do the job right.

His work crew was on time, very polite, professional, hard working and cleaned up the work area before leaving each night. Bob stayed on top of all the issues, was always accessible, and was patient in guiding us through the process always keeping our vision in mind. We couldn’t wait to get home each night, and see the progress. We thoroughly enjoyed working with Bob and his crew and are delighted with the great design, attention to detail, high quality work, and the resulting gorgeous, functional kitchen that was beyond our dream. Bob provides a high quality, customer focused service, and we would highly recommend him and his team.

We moved from the city to the suburbs and we knew going in that we wanted to redo the kitchen and open up the living space, as soon as spring came around. Initially, we interviewed a couple architects, but all they wanted to do was to mold the house into their vision and not ours. Then we found Bob and he immediately knew what we wanted to do with the space and more importantly knew our design aesthetic. He came up with a great kitchen design, open floor plan and created the perfect space for us. Given our budget, we had resigned ourselves to semi-custom cabinetry, but Bob came through again. He was able to get us a fully custom kitchen with virtually no change in the budget. We gave Bob yet another challenge, a time challenge. We were expecting our second child and we needed all major construction to be done by time the new baby arrived. Bob came through with flying colors. All major construction was done ahead of schedule. We couldn't have been happier. Not only was the work done
in time, the quality of the work was top notch and the construction crew are professional and courteous.

There are several general contractors we could have gone with, but Bob is special. He is a great combination of an architect, kitchen designer and general contractor. He has a great breadth of knowledge when it comes to home construction and we couldn't have chosen better. We would definitely use him for any future home improvement projects and would highly recommend him to others.

Project photos: http://www.houzz.com/projects/16252/Transitional-Espresso-Shaker-Style

Let me start by simply saying that our Kitchen and other home improvements we had Bob work on are simply "Amazing". Bob himself is the perfect gentleman, and he has built a team of phenomenal people around him so that you always have the right expert on the right job. On a number of feature requests we made, Bob went above and beyond to discover people as far away as Indiana that could get the job done perfectly. He listened to all our detailed requests and made each and every one of them happen. Robin, his designer, is truly amazing and again she personally went above and beyond to ensure every little detail was perfect, even giving up substantial time to help us get the right products ordered for a part of the project that was outside her scope. Each and every one of the people that worked on the job were incredibly polite and professional - Andrew being a particular star. 

Just to keep the review real, not everything went completely smooth. To be fair we did add significant work to the job, but the job did take longer than we expected to complete. The difficulty of living in a house that is being renovated is not to be underestimated, but no pain - no gain. Now that we are comfortably in our new kitchen and home, everything was worth it and I can't imagine going through this process without a person like Bob, who was available 24/7 to lead the efforts. Bob is so much more than a contractor, his full service design & build solution is truly the white glove service, the standard which all other service providers should strive to deliver. He told us he would never say no & he didn't. Now that the project is done, he is still readily available to fix any minor issues, he is a man that stands over his work. 

Let me just finish by saying, at his very core, Bob is a good man, a perfectionist who is proud of the work he and his team does, a master of his art.

I had a great experience with Bob! I found Bob after searching the web for Professionals near me. After meeting with a few different professionals Bob seemed the best for me and my project. 

He helped me through the entire process, helping me with each step and was great at explaining everything he was going to do, he even came shopping for ideas with me. I am not originally from the US and Bob was very patient in putting it in terms I would understand and explaining the things while comparing them to the European system for me!

This is our first home and our first remodel. Bob remodeled our bathrooms from the top down, as well as ripped out all of our piping that was very overdue for replacement. He treated everything with the best respect in our new home. 

I highly recommend Bob to anyone needing a great professional.

Do not use this guy.  We paid him $2,000 in August, 2021 to come out and give us a design.  Said would be 2 weeks and would get back to us.  Finally, in November, 2021, he gave us a preliminary design.  We discussed some changes and never heard a word back.  We have called, sent emails, and text messages with no responses.  

$2,000 down the drain with nothing to show for it.  Very poor service.  Do not use him!

Mike was great to work with in designing our pool and outdoor living space.  We had a vision of what we wanted but Mike was able to really bring it to life.  His experience came through in helping us make decisions for a final result that was better than we had imagined.

We are extremely pleased with Mike’s design of our pool and backyard transformation. Mike overcame what we thought insurmountable challenges: trees, slope, line of sight, and dimension obstacles. He created a design that is more beautiful than we imagined and has the recreational features we were dreaming of.  Mike has the experience, expertise, and creativity that you are looking for.  We highly recommend Mike Farley.

Mike is a great pool designer!  We didn't think we could fit everything we wanted in, but Mike made it work.  We only had to request one design change since his original was so good.  Mike discussed in-depth the steps that would happen.  Our nasty muddy backyard has been transformed into a backyard oasis.  We know have a sports pool, hot tub, basketball hoop, and a bbq/Green Egg to cook on. 

Mike truly understands how to take a space and make it into a functional living space. So glad we hired Mike for the biggest purchase of our lives.

Mike was great from start of design to finish.  Our pool is a difficult pool due to the grade on our lot but Mike was able to get what we wanted in there and his design is beautiful.  He also stepped in when another pool builder pulled out after 16 months of design and permitting.  Our pool needs to go in first due to the shape and size of our lot.  Mike saved our project!

Backyard transformation. The most critical phase of any project is choosing the right designer/contractor to do the job right the first time. When I  started the process I contacted three contractors and had them send out their designer. It quickly became apparent that the scope and complexity of my project would require a special designer. So I started over and I started researching designers not just the contractors as I had done the first time a round. After several weeks of research I narrowed it down to two designers. Mike Farley was my first call. After speaking with Mike over the phone and answering some of his questions I was confident I had found my designer. I decided I would wait until we met in person to make my final decision. Once I met Mike in person and walked the site of the project, I was 100% confident in his ability and knowledge. This was a totally different experience than I had with the other three designers. I knew I had found my designer and Contractor and we begin the process. The process has been seamless, from the initial design phase through the revisions and the selection process Mike has been there to answer all my questions and also offer his opinion and expertise which has made this a great experience. If you’re looking for a  world class designer look no further Mike Farley is your guy.

We hired Mike to do our backyard design and we were not disappointed! We had gone through several designs with different pool companies but were not drawn to any that we saw. When we hired Mike, he had a unique process of meeting with us first and asking a lot of questions to get to know our vision and figure out our budget first. What he came back with blew us away.  He is unique in that he listens to what you want and will create just that, but add in elements that you may not have thought of. For us it was the handing day bed! Thanks for a beautiful design Mike!  - Ginny B.

Highly recommend Mike for your pool designs.  He is very detail oriented and recommends/designs your outdoor living area to match your needs and intended use:  decking, hot tub, pool, pool type and size, equipment.  Most importantly, Mike was responsive and worked in a timely manner to for design-completion in order to facilitate timely construction.  I greatly appreciate his work as he transformed our backyard to a great outdoor living area.  John

Very professional on all fronts! 

Claffey Pools plays at the top of the construction game!

Mike F is in his craft is true craftsmen ! 

I would say this was a big decision but in downtown Grapevine I would not have choose anyone else ! 

This is my 2nd pool I have built with Claffey and honestly i just would not go anywhere else!

Frank Gorman 
Pacific Pools

The design of our swimming pool, outdoor living area and firepit way exceeded our expectations. Mike listened closely to our wants in the very beginning and transformed them into a really beautiful backyard environment! Thank You Mike!

We can't begin to say what a pleasure it is to work with Mike Farley and have him transform our backyard into the paradise that we were looking for.  The design process that he uses, where he gets to know you and what you are looking for and then turns that into reality is truly amazing!  Mike is a master of listening to you and what your desires are, understanding your budget, and bringing it all together into a remarkable design.   He highlighted pros and cons of different aspects, features and functionality of the pool so that we could make informed decisions.  Mike's process lets you iterate on your design(s) and to ensure you get the pool of your dreams.  Mike was masterful at taking our desires and transforming our blank slate into our resort paradise.  We have already recommended Mike to one of our neighbors and would recommend him to anyone!

Mike did a terrific job throughout the whole process from start of design to completion of construction.  His design ideas to complement the house design and property layout were excellent.  He answered all of our questions and communicated well with the construction crew.  Exceeded our expectations!!
